categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Samok was a Zabrak male Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the  Galactic Republic. Samok was stationed on Coruscant during the Cold War. While on Coruscant he taught new skills to any Jedi who wished to learn.
Samok was originally set to appear in the  video game Star Wars: The Old Republic but for whatever reason his character was cut before release. Samok's file can be found on Jedipedia.
